title: Dan Wheeler
deck: I've been part of Gateway for over 10 years since I moved to York and married Bethany. We have 3 children and a dog, so for a break (!) I go to work as an accountant in Leeds. I am on the Gateway preaching team and lead the Worship Team. I love to watch and talk about any sport and am a lifelong Swindon Town football fan.
titleRole: Worship Team Leader and Preaching Team
words: Repent for the Kingdom of Heaven has come near
